articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump: First U.S. death from coronavirus was a 'medically high risk' patient
articles.description: President Trump held a news conference to discuss coronavirus and the first confirmed U.S. death from the outbreak.

articles.title: Pence announces 'additional travel restrictions on Iran' amid coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Vice President Mike Pence announced that President Trump had approved additional travel restrictions against Iran to combat the spread of the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Velshi: The damage done to our trust in this government over coronavirus
articles.description: MSNBC’s Ali Velshi discusses why the trust Americans have in our government and it’s handling of the coronavirus may take a long time to heal.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: New coronavirus cases test readiness of U.S. response protocols
articles.description: Dr. Joseph Fair, virologist and infectious disease specialist, talks with Rachel Maddow about concerns for the health of medical professionals and others who may have come into contact with newly diagnosed coronavirus patients.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Former Health Dept. secretary criticizes Trump coronavirus response
articles.description: The Trump administration is not preparing properly for the worldwide coronavirus outbreak that is now impacting the United States, according to the 21st U.S. secretary of Health and Human Services, Kathleen Sebelius, who contrasts Donald Trump’s leadership to…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Window of opportunity for containing coronavirus rapidly closing
articles.description: Donald McNeil, science and health reporter for the New York Times, talks with Rachel Maddow about early assessments of the rate of transmission and rate of lethality of the new coronavirus.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Michael Moore: Trump calling coronavirus 'hoax' is 'dangerous'
articles.description: Oscar-winning documentary filmmaker Michael Moore blasts the presidents for attacking Democrats in the wake of fears over the coronavirus.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: First U.S. coronavirus death confirmed in Washington state
articles.description: The first confirmed death from coronavirus in the United States has been confirmed in Washington state. NBC's Scott Cohn has details.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Elizabeth Warren on Mike Pence leading the coronavirus response: ‘I cannot think of a worse person’
articles.description: Elizabeth Warren: “He’s actually the one guy around who has experience in dealing with a virus that gets out of control, only he’s the guy who went in exactly the wrong direction…I cannot think of a worse person to put in charge of dealing with the coronaviru…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Buttigieg on black voters: I’m determined to keep reaching out
articles.description: 2020 Democratic presidential candidate Pete Buttigieg discusses the South Carolina primary, the Trump administration’s coronavirus response, and his leadership background versus other candidates, also telling Joy Reid of his continuing black voter outreach, ‘…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Oregon officials announce first presumed case of coronavirus
articles.description: Rachel Maddow relays breaking news that health officials in Oregon have announced the state's first presumptive case of novel coronavirus, which would be the third community-spread case in the U.S. with no known origin.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump faces crisis of confidence and competence over coronavirus
articles.description: Ron Klain, Pres. Obama's Ebola Czar, and Laurie Garrett, Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter covering global pandemics, say the Trump administration has not inspired confidence nor shown competence in how it is combating coronavirus.
articles.content: Ron Klain, Pres. Obama's Ebola Czar, and Laurie Garrett, Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter covering global pandemics, say the Trump administration has not inspired confidence nor shown competence in how it is combating coronavirus.Feb. 29, 2020

articles.title: Trump calls coronavirus fear the Dems' 'new hoax' as more cases are confirmed
articles.description: While fears and the number of coronavirus cases keep growing, Trump held a rally and Mike Pence - who the president put in charge of the government's response - held a fundraiser.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'This is what we expected': Azar discusses risk of coronavirus in the U.S.
articles.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar claimed that the risk of coronavirus to most Americans "remains low" after the first confirmed death from the virus in the U.S.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Coronavirus fears cause stocks to plunge in worst week since 2008 financial crisis

articles.title: U.S. prep for coronavirus challenged by resource limitations

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: WaPo: Second coronavirus case confirmed in California
articles.description: Per the Washington Post, a second person in California has contracted the coronavirus without having traveled to any affected areas.
